website_summaries.verdict: A highly programmable and versatile bottle and food warmer from a trusted brand in baby products.
pros: Warms frozen, cold, and room temperature food and liquid
Works with bottles of liquid and jars of food
cons: Some users say it warms bottles too slowly

customer_reviews.title: A complete waste of money and piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Way over complicated to use and consistently would overheat the heat. I don't know why there's so many positive review. I also don't understand why Chicco decided to make warming bottles so complicated. There's 6 steps to turning on the bottle warmer and turning it on....6. The last thing I need as a new parent is to remember to do all 6 steps perfectly. Even when I did, the milk still came out scolding hot. A complete waste of money and piece of trash. Just warm up a cup of water in the microwave and put the bottle in there for a few minutes. It's faster, doesn't burn the milk and way cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Brandon L Treece

customer_reviews.title: A bit too complicated for the sitters
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it is a great product, but it was too complicated to set up for older babysitters. I had a difficult time trying to explain it to them before out of the box. Newborns are complicated enough... this product was adding to the complexity when we thought it would make life simpler for them. Also since they have numerous power outages, they would have to reprogram more often leading to confusion and frustration. For these reasons, we gave it a below par for our babysitting needs.
customer_reviews.author: L G

customer_reviews.title: Very useful and works as described.
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is really convenient -- I mix up his bottle and pop the bottle in the warmer for a few minutes. I'm a directions follower and they worked perfectly -- the milk comes out just right (of course I test it on my wrist first though and make my husband do the same). It's not too hot or cold and I don't have to worry about watching the time since it alerts when the cycle finishes. It also works well with the little basket for warming food. I'm not a believer in the microwave for baby so this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: red she said

customer_reviews.title: Good for same bottle every time
customer_reviews.text: After reading the instructions I decided this was definitely not the bottle warmer for us. Depending on the bottle size, you need to put in a specific amount of water (2 Tbsp... 3 Tbsp... 6Tbsp...) We use lots of different size bottles so there’s no way I’m measuring out the water every single time. If you heat up the exact same size bottle every time, it might be a good one for you
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hecker

customer_reviews.title: ... with the sterilizer units and it makes for a great combo. This unit is quiet and it heats ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this together with the sterilizer units and it makes for a great combo. This unit is quiet and it heats up nice and fast without burning my fingers. I love the display. Chicco knocks it outta the park with their baby gear.
customer_reviews.author: The Flyin' Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice warmer, heated up very quickly, nice quality product, with routine cleaning to keep the inside from getting slimy from the water heating an cooling like any warmer, it was a little difficult, we had to use q-tips to get in the crevices in the bottom but wasn’t bad
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: We used with avent and medella bottles and they both fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: As a new mom of twins we needed a warmer stat and this one worked perfectly! We used with avent and medella bottles and they both fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly LaPorte

customer_reviews.title: Both are very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter's new baby. Both are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna K Bickl

customer_reviews.title: Great Bottle Warmer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. It warms the bottles nicely and evenly. You do have to plan ahead as it takes some time to warm up depending on how cold your breastmilk or formula is. If you have a crying baby, you won't be able to use this immediately. Otherwise, I am happy with this bottle warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and the bottle is ready in 3 minutes; used with the Avent bottles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost good
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had an option for a smaller size bottle. Doesn’t work for me because of that. This should be able to be used on a 2 oz bottle and you can’t because you have to keep checking it.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to warm up. My newborn ends up ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to warm up. My newborn ends up screaming and I have to warm up her bottle another way. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: good bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: Does what I needed it to do.. The only thing is temperature often varies. And also it is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna

customer_reviews.title: Very Hot
customer_reviews.text: Overheated the milk by a lot. Would have hurt the baby if he would have taken it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great warmer
customer_reviews.text: It works like it says it's suppose to. Quick warm up even for frozen breastmilk bags.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita E.

customer_reviews.title: Sloooooow
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to work a battle n heating time doesn't seem logical
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Warmer worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase a much cheaper model but saw this and had to purchase it. A very nice bottle warmer, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Trin

customer_reviews.title: I like the timer
customer_reviews.text: I like the timer. However, check the milk always because it is very inconsistent and the milk can be either very cold or very hot!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Bottles get too hot.
customer_reviews.text: Just okay. It tends to overheat bottles even on the lowest setting. I wish it allowed you to set a timer for 5 minutes since that's when they seem to be done. For the price I expected it work better.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Restel

customer_reviews.title: Bottle warmer
customer_reviews.text: This product makes making the baby bottles much easier!! Absolutely love it and would recommend it to anyone having a baby or just having baby looking for one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lenna Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product never worked since I got it. I wonder why it has a lot of positive feedback. It’s of poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Adel

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle warmer!
customer_reviews.text: I used this bottle warmer for my first child and loved it! Then we had twins, so I knew we would need two. I wouldn’t have bought anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Parker

customer_reviews.title: Oh yeah...this is hot!
customer_reviews.text: Warms well and is easy to operate. We keep it upstairs so we aren't needing to go up and down stairs to warm bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Donkey

customer_reviews.title: First time I used the product, it did not ...
customer_reviews.text: First time I used the product, it did not work so I am not able to do anything with it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolf Frederuk Smit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what I wanted and it arrived in a very timely matter.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Frissora

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits our comotomo bottles and warms the milk fast. It is Very user friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: It's quick and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer does the job. It is a little light, so when you push the buttons it will move on you. I don't think it's that big of deal, but my husband hates it. It's quick and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not enjoying worrying about such specific amounts of water to ...
customer_reviews.text: Not enjoying worrying about such specific amounts of water to add, and it takes a long time to warm up milk. Not user friendly for others to use (husband, babysitter).
customer_reviews.author: americkso

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. We love Chicco products.
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I use this 6 to 8 times a day. Easily one of the best purchases we've made for our baby boy.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that I don't like is how often I have to put water in ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I don't like is how often I have to put water in this. Everything else is amazing
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: dont do it!!
customer_reviews.text: AWEFUL!!! shuts off randomly, hard to get an even temp
customer_reviews.author: Katiebug66

customer_reviews.title: Just fine.
customer_reviews.text: This bottle warmer is fine. It gets the job done. I find that if I let the bottle warm for the full time the machine recommends then it gets too hot. I don't really have any complaints but a cheaper bottle warmer would do the exact same thing. We need a second bottle warmer for upstairs and I will probably purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to take in the diaper bag thinking it would be smaller than the one we have at home. It wasn't. Also, I thought it would be a quick warm up but it took at least five minutes to warm up the milk. Our other one only takes two minutes. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur C

customer_reviews.title: It works okay. Ive found that its quicker to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. Ive found that its quicker to microwave water in a coffee mug and place the bottle in the hot water afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Malcomb

customer_reviews.title: I like the timer feature and that it beeps when done
customer_reviews.text: I like the timer feature and that it beeps when done. I like that you can adjust it for various sizes and whether you want to thaw, heat, or bring to room temperature. Sometimes it's hard to tell that it's actually on - you have to push the button again after it's all set to ensure it starts. Also, it's only supposed to need about a jigger of water, but unless you put more, the milk doesn't get very warm. One more thing, the metal plate in the bottom is kind of rusting so there is a residue and the water gets slightly orange. It doesn't interact with the formula, but it looks kind of grody.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could not use it still, there is no option ...
customer_reviews.text: Could not use it still, there is no option to use it outside US. It should have been mentioned clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: Chicco Digital Bottle & Baby Food Jar Warmer with LCD Display, Digital Countdown and Ready Alert, Fits Most Bottles and Baby Food Jars, White
product_meta.description: Chicco's Bottle and Baby Food Digital Warmer preserves breast milk nutrients with its multiple and more efficient warming options. The Digital Warmer safely defrosts milk and food with settings to meet your specific needs. Choose a bottle or jar size and a starting temperature such as Freezer, Refrigerator or Room for efficient and customized warming. An optional timer delay has your baby's food ready right when you need it and the automatic safety shut-off keeps baby's food from overheating.
feature_bullets: Insert for small bottles and baby food jars
Automatically shuts off and alerts when ready

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
